ModMetaData.name: VGP Garden Resources
ModMetaData.author: dismarzero
ModMetaData.description:
Garden Resources (Does not require Vegetable Garden)
Research Resource Plants: -Steel Shrooms -Plasteel Bulb Chunks -Gold Fern Leaves -Silver Flower Petals -Uranium Root Bulbs
-Adds new recipes added to the Electric Smelter to smelt plants.
Grow Resources: - Grow plants, which soak up minerals from the ground. - Extract the minerals into ores at the Electric Smelter. - Requires high growing and crafting skills.
